obs: We did not consider genera Anurolimnas, Rufirallus, Micropygia.
We did not consider genera Bartramia, Thinocorus.
We considered Sterna dougallii in the total number of species (Pacheco et al. 2021 [Ornithology Research] classify it as both, ‘Visitant’ and ‘Vagrant’; p. 19).
We considered Diomedea sanfordi, Phoebetria palpebrata, and Thalassarche cauta in the total number of species (Although Pacheco et al. 2021 [Ornithology Research] classify them as ‘Vagrants’; p. 20).
*Although Nacimento et al. 2022 (Biodiversidade Brasileira, 12(1): 15-24) report on ‘Oceanites oceanicus’, it is not included here
We considered Halobaena caerulea in the total number of species, as one study analysed stomach contents from this species.
